<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> &lt; PadTo) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> &lt; PadTo - 1; ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#42;p++ = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&#39;\\x80&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#42;p++ = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&#39;\\x00&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)(p - orig&#95;p);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Utility function to decode a ULEB128 value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If \\p error is non-null, it will point to a static error message,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// if an error occured. It will not be modified on success.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3720bbfe79232f7792ab4b969dfbeed0"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3720bbfe79232f7792ab4b969dfbeed0">decodeULEB128</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t &#42;p, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;n = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t &#42;end = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t &#42;orig&#95;p = p;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Shift = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a104cae72182bec0ab951e3faea6ce509">LLVM&#95;UNLIKELY</a>(p == end)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;malformed uleb128, extends past end&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Slice = &#42;p &amp; 0x7f;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a104cae72182bec0ab951e3faea6ce509">LLVM&#95;UNLIKELY</a>(Shift &gt;= 63) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ((Shift == 63 &amp;&amp; (Slice &lt;&lt; Shift &gt;&gt; Shift) != Slice) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">         (Shift &gt; 63 &amp;&amp; Slice != 0))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;uleb128 too big for uint64&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> += Slice &lt;&lt; Shift;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Shift += 7;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&#42;p++ &gt;= 128);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (n)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#42;n = (unsigned)(p - orig&#95;p);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Utility function to decode a SLEB128 value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If \\p error is non-null, it will point to a static error message,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// if an error occured. It will not be modified on success.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a405b6cecd013148b4b443dd37854b4c4"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a405b6cecd013148b4b443dd37854b4c4">decodeSLEB128</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t &#42;p, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;n = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t &#42;end = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Shift = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t Byte;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a104cae72182bec0ab951e3faea6ce509">LLVM&#95;UNLIKELY</a>(p == end)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;malformed sleb128, extends past end&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (n)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#42;n = (unsigned)(p - orig&#95;p);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Byte = &#42;p;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Slice = Byte &amp; 0x7f;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a104cae72182bec0ab951e3faea6ce509">LLVM&#95;UNLIKELY</a>(Shift &gt;= 63) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ((Shift == 63 &amp;&amp; Slice != 0 &amp;&amp; Slice != 0x7f) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">         (Shift &gt; 63 &amp;&amp; Slice != (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &lt; 0 ? 127 : 0x00)))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;sleb128 too big for int64&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (n)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#42;n = (unsigned)(p - orig&#95;p);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> |= Slice &lt;&lt; Shift;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Shift += 7;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++p;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Byte &gt;= 128);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sign extend negative numbers if needed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Shift &lt; 64 &amp;&amp; (Byte &amp; 0x40))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> |= <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#a30654b4b67d97c42ca3f9b6052dda916">UINT64&#95;MAX</a> &lt;&lt; Shift;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (n)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#42;n = (unsigned)(p - orig&#95;p);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4bf1e06696f761b02872434c1996cd28"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4bf1e06696f761b02872434c1996cd28">decodeULEB128AndInc</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t &#42;&amp;p, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t &#42;end,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Utility function to get the size of the ULEB128-encoded value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">extern</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa02a1d8fb0f561ab81f4a2570db7dc28">getULEB128Size</a>(uint64&#95;t Value);</span></CodeLine>
